attributes.action: Put an end to the increasing criminalisation of the populace by vindictive laws
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly we hear cases each day of ordinary people, usually with no record, being criminalised by the increasingly draconian laws passed by government.  I petition to restore some sense of balance, replace fining culture with encouragement and reduce the powers of councils and government to make criminals out of people.
